title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2604.3 - Project certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2604.3 - Project certification

State Regulations

The corporation shall not provide DWSRF financial assistance
to a recipient unless and until the department has certified to the
corporation, in writing, that: (a) the
project to be financed through the DWSRF is an eligible project; and
(b) all applicable requirements of the
department have been met, including, without limitation, requirements relating
to equivalency projects, and all Federal and State requirements relating to
environmental review of the project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2604.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
